price: 48. Et ils disent : « Quand donc se réalisera cette promesse, si vous dites vrai ? »
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
